meanings.definition: The quality or condition of being intense.
meanings.sent1: The intensities of the colors in the painting were breathtaking.
meanings.sent2: The intensities of the emotions in the movie were palpable.
meanings.sent3: The intensities of the flavors in the dish surprised everyone.
meanings.sent4: The intensities of the storm shook the entire town.
meanings.sent5: The intensities of the music filled the room with energy.

meanings.definition: The degree or amount of intensity.
meanings.sent1: The intensities of the heat in the desert were unbearable.
meanings.sent2: The intensities of the competition were high.
meanings.sent3: The intensities of the traffic made everyone late.
meanings.sent4: The intensities of the argument reached a peak.
meanings.sent5: The intensities of the workout left her exhausted but satisfied.

meanings.definition: The strength or force of something.
meanings.sent1: The intensities of the waves crashing against the shore were mesmerizing.
meanings.sent2: The intensities of the wind during the storm were frightening.
meanings.sent3: The intensities of the engine roars echoed through the valley.
meanings.sent4: The intensities of the athlete's determination were inspiring.
meanings.sent5: The intensities of the sun's rays warmed the entire garden.
